title: Sales Agent unable to onboard new merchant due to incorrect min-max rates for fees
description: Sales agent was trying to onboard a new merchant but ran into an issue when entering fees. The sales agent entered minimum and maximum rate values that are not within the acceptable range (0-100). This caused form validation errors and prevented the onboarding process from proceeding.
resolution: ["Asked Sales Agent to re-enter fees with correct min-max rates", "Verified with Sales Team that correct ranges should be 1-99 for monthly fee and 10-50 for setup fee", "Updated merchant records to reflect corrected fees"]

title: Sales Agent Unable to Onboard Merchant Due to Validation Error
description: A sales agent attempted to onboard a merchant but encountered an error when trying to save the merchant information. The error message indicated that the 'monthly fee' field was invalid. After investigating, it was discovered that the 'min_rate' and 'max_rate' fields were not properly formatted. To resolve this issue, I asked the user to reformat these fields, called them to verify, and then reassigned the values. Once corrected, the merchant information could be successfully saved.
resolution: ["Asked user to reformat 'min_rate' and 'max_rate' fields to numeric format", "Called user to verify that correction was made", "Reassigned values to correct min-max rates for fees"]

title: Merchant Agreement PDF generation not working
description: Sales agents are unable to generate and download the unsigned merchant agreement (PDF) due to an issue with the payment service equipments. They report that the dropdown menu for selecting equipment types is empty, resulting in an error when trying to proceed with the onboarding process.
resolution: ["Requested technical support to investigate the issue", "Verified with developers that the equipment options are hardcoded and need updating", "Implemented a fix to populate the equipment options and re-tested the feature"]

title: Sales Agent unable to onboard Merchant due to missing 'Address' field in form
description: The Sales Agent was attempting to complete the merchant onboarding process but encountered an error when trying to save the information. Upon investigation, it was found that the 'Address' field had not been populated. The Sales Agent was asked to recomplete the form with the correct information.
resolution: ["Asked Sales Agent to recomplete the form with correct Address information", "Verified that 'Address' field is required for merchant onboarding", "Sent email reminder to Sales Agent with detailed instructions on how to fill out address field"]

title: Sales Agent unable to upload merchant agreement after e-signing
description: Sales agent was attempting to onboard a new merchant but encountered an issue when trying to upload the signed merchant agreement to the system. The agreement failed to validate, resulting in an error message stating that the document is missing required fields.
resolution: Verified with sales agent that the merchant had correctly e-signed the agreement and that the document was not corrupted
Asking sales agent to re-upload the agreement and check the 'agreement' field for any typos or formatting issues
Provided sales agent with a detailed guide on how to validate the agreement fields before uploading, including checking for missing or duplicate fields

title: Sales Agent login issues
description: Sales agent is unable to log in to merchant onboarding application, encountering an error message. The issue occurred when trying to access the application for the first time. The sales agent has tried resetting their password but is still experiencing issues.
resolution: ["Asked sales agent to verify their email address and username", "Sent a password reset link to the provided email address", "Requested sales agent to try logging in again with the new credentials"]

title: Merchant Agreement PDF Generation Issue
description: Sales agent is unable to generate unsigned version of merchant agreement (PDF) and also signing fails due to invalid merchant details. The problem persists even after clearing browser cache and reloading the page.
resolution: ["Checked merchant information for validity", "Verified that payment services equipments are correctly listed", "Generated new signed PDF for the merchant and contacted sales agent to re upload it"]

title: Sales Agent unable to onboard new merchant due to form validation error
description: Sales Agent was trying to create a new merchant account but was getting form validation errors for 'min_rate' field. Upon re-checking, it was found that the value entered was less than the minimum allowed rate.
resolution: Called Sales Agent to verify and clarify the issue
Verified with Sales Agent that the 'min_rate' field had an invalid value
Provided updated guidelines on validation for the 'min_rate' field

title: Sales Agent unable to onboard merchant due to incorrect min-max rates for fees
description: Sales agent was trying to onboard a new merchant but encountered an error while entering the fee rates. The sales agent entered the minimum and maximum rate as 1 and 2 respectively, which caused the application to reject the entry. When the sales agent tried to save the form, they received an error message stating that the rate should be within a valid range.
resolution: ["Asked user to verify correct fee rates with Sales Team", "Adjusted min-max rates for fees to valid range (1-10) and re-entered values", "Saved updated form data"]

title: Failed Merchant Onboarding Due to Incorrect POS Terminal Count
description: Sales Agent attempted to onboard merchant but encountered an error while saving equipment information. The form validation failed due to incorrect min-max rates for the number of POS terminals. This caused the onboarding process to stall and prevent further progress.
resolution: Contacted sales agent to verify correct rates
Modified input fields to display valid range options
Re-run form validation with corrected data

title: Error in Merchant Agreement e-Signature
description: Sales agent reported that when a merchant attempts to sign the agreement using e-signature, they encounter an error. The system fails to load the PDF document for signing and the merchant is unable to complete the process.
resolution: Asked sales agent to verify if the agreement document was correctly uploaded to the system.
Asked sales agent to try again with a different browser or device.
Remanded the issue to the development team to review the e-signature functionality and resolve any issues with PDF rendering.

title: Payment Processor System Error: Merchant Agreement PDF Not Loading
description: Sales agent encountered an issue while trying to onboard a new merchant. When attempting to view and sign the merchant agreement (PDF), it fails to load, resulting in the onboarding process getting stuck at this stage. The error message displayed is "Error loading agreement". This issue prevents the sales agent from progressing with the onboarding flow.
resolution: Called the Sales Agent's manager for assistance in resolving the issue.
Checked the system logs to determine if there were any previous errors or issues related to the agreement PDF.
Implemented a temporary fix by updating the agreement template and re-running the agreement loading process for all affected merchants.

title: Sales Agent unable to onboard merchant due to incorrect min-max rates for fees
description: A sales agent attempted to onboard a merchant but encountered an error when entering fees for payment services. The min-max rates specified were invalid, causing the form to become unresponsive and preventing the onboarding process from proceeding.
resolution: ["Called the sales agent to verify the entered values", "Confirmed that the min-max rates for fees are correct and provided a template for reference", "Provided additional training on the application's fee rate guidelines to prevent similar issues in the future"]

title: Error occurred while onboarding merchant
description: When trying to onboard a new merchant, the sales agent encountered an error. The error message displayed was 'Invalid POS terminal quantity', indicating that the quantity of POS terminals entered exceeded the maximum allowed. This resulted in the application redirecting back to the login page without allowing the merchant to proceed.
resolution: Asked user to re-enter POS terminal quantity within the valid range
Confirmed with sales agent that they had made an error and corrected it
Implemented additional validation on POS terminal quantity to prevent similar errors in the future

title: Sales Agent unable to onboard new merchant due to incorrect min-max rates for fees
description: When trying to save the onboarding form, the sales agent received an error message stating that the minimum fee rate is higher than the maximum. This resulted in the inability to complete the onboarding process.
resolution: Verified with the Payment Processor's system to confirm the correct min-max rates for fees
Adjusted the fee rates accordingly and re-saved the form data
Reminded the sales agent of the importance of accurately inputting fee rates during the onboarding process

title: Sales Agent unable to onboard merchant due to invalid fee rates
description: The sales agent was attempting to onboard a new merchant but encountered an error while entering fees. The error message indicated that the min-max rates for one of the payment services were outside valid range.
resolution: ["Checked the documentation for valid rate ranges", "Confirmed with Payment Processor's support team to confirm correct rates", "Updated fee fields in application to ensure accuracy and proceed with onboarding"]

title: Payment Processor Onboarding Application Error
description: Sales Agent encounters an error while onboarding a new merchant for Bank of Mock payments services. The issue occurred when trying to save fees information and resulted in a validation error due to incorrect min-max rates.
resolution: ["Called user to verify the correct format for fees input", "Updated the application to validate fees against a defined rate range", "Implemented auto-suggest feature for minimum and maximum rates"]

title: Sales Agent Struggles with Merchant Onboarding
description: The sales agent is unable to onboard a new merchant due to an issue with the POS terminal equipment. The system displays an error message saying that the minimum rate for the POS terminal is 5,000 KES per transaction, but the sales agent inputted 3,000 KES. When asked to reinput the correct value, the sales agent forgot to update the maximum rate as well. As a result, the merchant onboarding process was halted until the issue was resolved.
resolution: ["Called the sales agent to verify the POS terminal equipment details", "Asked the sales agent to reinput the correct values for min and max rates of POS terminal equipment", "Updated the system with the corrected rates and proceeded with the merchant onboarding process"]

title: Merchant Agreement PDF Not Loading Properly
description: When logged into the merchant dashboard, the agreement PDF fails to load. The user sees an error message stating 'Failed to retrieve document' and is unable to proceed with signing the agreement.
resolution: ["Checked if the server-side document storage was up to date", "Verified that the PDF file was correctly uploaded and linked to the merchant's profile", "Asked IT team to investigate further and resolve the issue by updating the document storage and ensuring a stable connection"]

title: Sales Agent unable to onboard merchant due to invalid min-max rates for fees
description: Sales agent attempted to onboard a new merchant but encountered an error when setting up the payment services equipments. The error message indicated that the min-max rates provided were outside of acceptable limits. Despite retrying, the sales agent was unable to proceed with onboarding.
resolution: ["Asked Sales Agent to verify the minimum and maximum rate values against the system's guidelines", "Confirmed the rates with the merchant to ensure they met the required criteria", "Updated the payment services equipments with corrected rates and completed onboarding successfully"]
